name: Melody Waltz
description:
Melody Waltz is a 2D-platformer which takes place inside the mind of our protagonist Midi. Venture through his life traumas and challenge the horrors which rests there. To escape his mind Midi must confront his bully and stand victorious.

Features
  • Amazing movement mechanics
  • Fascinating grappling hook
  • Incredible AI
  • Spectacular level design
  • Breathtaking boss fight experience
Minimum System Requirements
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-4210M CPU @ 2.60GHz
  • Memory: 8GB RAM
  • Graphics:  Intel HD Graphics 4600, NVIDIA GeForce GT 720M
  • Storage: 500MB available space
Creators

Axel Winroth - Programmer
Fredrik Heed Elvegård - Programmer
William Andersson - Programmer
Yasaman Yekta  - Artist
